name: CreateAccessGroupProject
description: Create a project within a specific access group.

parameters.name: access_group_id_or_name
parameters.description: Identifier or name of the access group to associate with the project. It helps specify which access group the new project will be part of.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project to be added to the access group.

parameters.name: project_role
parameters.description: The role to be assigned to the project within the access group. Options: 'ADMIN', 'PROJECT_VIEWER', 'PROJECT_DEVELOPER'.

value_schema.description: The project role that will be added to this Access Group.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The unique identifier slug for the team on whose behalf the request is made.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The project role that will be added to this Access Group.

value_schema.description: The project role that will be added to this Access Group.
